titleStmt.title: Calvers royall vision. With his most humble addresses to His Majesties royall person.
titleStmt.author: Calver, Edward, fl. 1649.

notesStmt.note: The titlepage is printed on A1v opposite an engraved plate of Calver in repose with his vision of the royal family engraved above him.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
